generate_store.description: Generates a Spree starter with integration and backend modules.

input.custom_integration_repository: What's the URL of the custom integration's git repository?

message.skipping: Skipping process of generating the "{{ name }}"...
message.success: Successfully generated your Spree starter at "./{{ projectName }}"!
message.configure: Visit {{ documentationURL }} to learn how to configure the "{{ name }}".
message.start: Once finished, you can start the project using this command:
message.build_scripts_skipping: No build script provided for "{{ name }}". Skipping...
message.dependency_not_found: Could not find "{{ name }}" on your machine. Please install it before running Spree CLI
message.dependency_version_mismatch: The configuration you chose requires "{{ name }}" "{{ expectedVersion }}", while version "{{ currentVersion }}" is currently installed. Please install the correct version before running Spree CLI

input.project_name: Provide project name that you would like to be booted up

directory.was_not_found: The directory "{{ directory }}" was not found.

project_name.is_not_directory: Please input a name that can be used as directory.
